DOC.brief_summary: Prompt delivery cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) double victim chance survival cardiac arrest ( CA ) , yet provide less 1/3 witnessed event . Studies indicate video-based education method effectively train bystander CPR . Using education evaluation method exist in-hospital training program , investigator assess CPR skill student teach video-only method , without psychomotor skill practice , compare use video self-instruction ( VSI ) kit .
DOC.brief_title: A Mannequin Study Assess Various CPR Training Methods Using Student Population
DOC.detailed_description: The long term goal work implement real world CPR training strategy maximize resuscitation skill retention , promote willingness act address major barrier train include time cost . To accomplish , study team train student volunteer University Pennsylvania use one three method : 1 ) video-only method psychomotor skill practice , 2 ) video-only method psychomotor skill practice household object 3 ) video self-instruction ( VSI ) kit . Volunteers young , healthy student University Pennsylvania CPR Training within last 24 month . The investigator use American Heart Association 's CPR Anytime Video Self-Instruction Kit come equip DVD inflatable manikin . For group receive Video-Only method , investigator remove inflatable manikin train subject DVD . The investigator randomize participant one video-only method VSI kit method training schedule training . Immediately follow training , investigator conduct CPR skill test measure effectiveness training method . Three ( 3 ) twelve ( 12 ) month post-training investigator schedule conduct in-person interview subject . As part interview , subject ask complete survey measure comfort level willingness use CPR skill . Subjects also ask complete another CPR Skills test .
DOC.criteria: Must able complete 2530 minute moderate physical activity CPR Training within past 24 month
